name: Berserker
description: Become a raging, damage-dealing machine. Increase your damage to unbelievable levels. Use Savage Arsenal to crush foes and laugh in the face of death.

name: The Cheat
description: Break the rules! Change dice to suit you best. Sneak in and backstab with devastating critical hits. Fight dirty with pocket sand, low blows, and disappearing into the night.

name: Commander
description: Issue powerful tactical commands to allies. Exert mastery over all weapon types. Exploit tactical prowess to outwit and outmaneuver foes.

name: Hunter
description: Relentless trackers and expert survivalists. Mark prey and become a shadow in pursuit. Harness the Thrill of the Hunt to outwit targets. Deadly from afar or up close.

name: Mage
description: Customize spells as a Spellshaper. Harness elemental mastery over fire, ice, and lightning. Snatch control of the frayed mana tapestry or lean into chaos.

name: Oathsworn
description: Shield allies from harm and channel righteous judgment. Stand as a bastion of defense. Mend wounds, discern truth, and inspire others as a beacon of virtue.

name: Shadowmancer
description: Forge pacts with ancient entities and draw incomprehensible power. Master shadow minions and summon legions to overwhelm adversaries.

name: Shepherd
description: Embody the forces of Life and Death, wielding spells from chosen domains. Summon a Lifebinding spirit companion to bolster allies or smite foes.

name: Songweaver
description: Charm people and inspire allies to fantastic heights of heroism. Use lyrical weaponry and powerful charisma to dominate enemies. Control the battlefield with chords of chaos.

name: Stormshifter
description: Aid allies in whatever role is most needed. Shapeshift into beasts ranging from friendly to vicious. Cast powerful spells to strike, control, and mend from distance.

name: Zephyr
description: Unarmed and dangerous. When unarmed and unarmored, become a relentless force. Move with unparalleled speed, seize initiative, and retaliate with precision.
